functions.name: Get holders of Token on BSC
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific token on Binance Smart Chain

args.name: TokenAddress
args.description: The contract address of a BSC token.

functions.name: Get holders of NFT on BSC
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific NFT on Binance Smart Chain

args.name: TokenAddress
args.description: The contract address of a NFT on BSC.
